title: Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate and fold in whipped cream. Chill until set.

title: Lemon Tart
instructions: Bake tart crust, then fill with lemon custard. Chill before serving.

title: Strawberry Shortcake
instructions: Layer biscuits with cream and strawberries. Serve chilled.

title: Banana Bread
instructions: Mix mashed bananas with batter. Bake until golden.

title: Apple Crisp
instructions: Top sliced apples with oat mixture. Bake until bubbly.

title: Vanilla Pudding
instructions: Cook milk with sugar and cornstarch. Add vanilla and cool.

title: Peach Cobbler
instructions: Layer peaches in pan and cover with batter. Bake until browned.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Layer coffee-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone mix. Chill overnight.

title: Rice Pudding
instructions: Simmer rice in milk with sugar. Add cinnamon and serve warm or cold.

title: Coconut Macaroons
instructions: Mix ingredients, form into balls. Bake until golden.

title: Brownies
instructions: Mix and bake until center is just set. Cool before cutting.

title: Pumpkin Pie
instructions: Pour filling into pie shell. Bake until center is firm.

title: Creme Brulee
instructions: Bake custard in water bath. Chill and torch sugar top.

title: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
instructions: Arrange fruit at bottom, pour batter on top. Bake and invert.

title: Molten Lava Cake
instructions: Bake until edges are set but center is gooey. Serve warm.

title: Panna Cotta
instructions: Heat cream with sugar and vanilla. Add gelatin and chill.

title: Blueberry Muffins
instructions: Fold berries into batter. Bake until golden.

title: Carrot Cake
instructions: Mix shredded carrots with batter. Bake and frost if desired.

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
instructions: Mix and shape dough. Press with fork and bake.

title: Cheesecake
instructions: Pour filling into crust. Bake, then chill thoroughly.

title: Baklava
instructions: Layer phyllo with nuts and bake. Pour syrup on top.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Mix ingredients, drop dough on tray. Bake until golden.

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop fruit, drizzle with honey. Garnish with mint.

title: Cinnamon Rolls
instructions: Roll dough with cinnamon filling. Bake and glaze.

title: Chocolate Truffles
instructions: Chill ganache, roll into balls. Dust with cocoa.

title: Bread Pudding
instructions: Soak bread in custard mix. Bake until set.

title: Profiteroles
instructions: Fill puffs with cream. Drizzle with chocolate.

title: Ice Cream Sandwiches
instructions: Scoop ice cream between cookies. Freeze until firm.

title: Eclairs
instructions: Pipe pastry, bake and fill with cream. Top with glaze.

title: Tres Leches Cake
instructions: Soak sponge cake with milk mixture. Chill and serve.
